comment: Smart Data Models - ExcIEEEAC7B adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.EnergyCIM/master/ExcIEEEAC7B/schema.json
description: Adapted from CIM data models. The class represents IEEE Std 421.5-2005 type AC7B model. The model represents excitation systems which consist of an ac alternator with either stationary or rotating rectifiers to produce the dc field requirements. It is an upgrade to earlier ac excitation systems, which replace only the controls but retain the ac alternator and diode rectifier bridge.  Reference: IEEE Standard 421.5-2005 Section 6.7.  In the IEEE Standard 421.5 - 2005, the [1 / sT] block is shown as [1 / (1 +

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: description
contents.comment: A description of this item

contents.name: kc
contents.comment: Rectifier loading factor proportional to commutating reactance (K). Typical Value = 0.18. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kd
contents.comment: Demagnetizing factor, a function of exciter alternator reactances (K).  Typical Value = 0.02. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kdr
contents.comment: Voltage regulator derivative gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ke
contents.comment: Exciter constant related to self-excited field (K).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf1
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0.212. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf2
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kf3
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer gain (K).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kia
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 59.69. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kir
contents.comment: Voltage regulator integral gain (K).  Typical Value = 4.24. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kl
contents.comment: Exciter field voltage lower limit parameter (K).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kp
contents.comment: Potential circuit gain coefficient (K).  Typical Value = 4.96. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpa
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 65.36. Default: 0.0

contents.name: kpr
contents.comment: Voltage regulator proportional gain (K).  Typical Value = 4.24. Default: 0.0

contents.name: name
contents.comment: The name of this item.

contents.name: seve1
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.44. Default: 0.0

contents.name: seve2
contents.comment: Exciter saturation function value at the corresponding exciter voltage, V, back of commutating reactance (S[V]).  Typical Value = 0.075. Default: 0.0

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: tdr
contents.comment: Lag time constant (T).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

contents.name: te
contents.comment: Exciter time constant, integration rate associated with exciter control (T).  Typical Value = 1.1. Default: 0

contents.name: tf
contents.comment: Excitation control system stabilizer time constant (T).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0

contents.name: vamax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vamin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -0.95. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve1
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V) equals V (V).  Typical Value = 6.3. Default: 0.0

contents.name: ve2
contents.comment: Exciter alternator output voltages back of commutating reactance at which saturation is defined (V).  Typical Value = 3.02. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vemin
contents.comment: Minimum exciter voltage output (V).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vfemax
contents.comment: Exciter field current limit reference (V).  Typical Value = 6.9. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmax
contents.comment: Maximum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = 5.79. Default: 0.0

contents.name: vrmin
contents.comment: Minimum voltage regulator output (V).  Typical Value = -5.79. Default: 0.0

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: address
contents.comment: The mailing address
